## Hook class

Basic Hook Type

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare abstract class Hook<T, R> 
```

## Remarks

All subtype hooks are extends from `Hook` which provide the tapping and calling logic

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |

|  [exhaust()](./hamon.hook.exhaust.md) |  | clear all tapping from hook |
